inventory=[{"type": "barrier", "quantity": 29, "index": 11}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 18, "index": 26}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 17, "index": 37}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft magenta_stained_glass_pane, I need to place 6 magenta_stained_glass side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move one of the magenta_stained_glass to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
